metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20867 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: A fully compromised ESXi host can force VMware Tools to fail to authenticate host-to-guest operations, impacting the confidentiality and integrity of the guest virtual machine.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, this is a low-severity issue an attacker must have root access on the host to exploit the guest, which doesn't really give any extra privileges

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
